## DDNM

### 1 

To begin with, we want to written DDNM as form of MDM. The DDNM is as below:  
$$
y_{jt}=c_{jt}+\sum_{j=1}^{p(a)}\phi_{ij}X_{ij}+\sum_{i\in pa(j)}+v_{jt}
$$
